Name: Prayer Vigil for those who have been disappeared by ICE
Organization: Sacred Resistance, NEFESH, SEIU Local 721, CHIRLA
State Purpose: Women of faith have been gathering weekly in Orange County and Los Angeles to pray for the return of family members who have been detained or deported. We invite people of all genders to accompany them and hold our disappeared community members in prayer. We are hurting along with them, and we have their backs.This week's vigils will take place on Tuesday 7/8 in Los Angeles, and Thursday 7/10 in Orange County. Please see flyers for details and to RSVP.

Name: Summer of Resistance
State Purpose: As part of the Summer of Resistance, 50501 SoCal is honored to present our live sound solution for on the ground resistance events. Name: Salsa on Sunset
State Purpose: The recent pressure on immigrant communities in LA has left many of us feeling angry, frustrated, and at times helpless. Our goal with Salsa on Sunset is to create a joyful, inclusive space for everyone to gather, regardless of race, creed, or immigration status. In this spirit, we‚Äôre holding a special fundraiser: "Salsa for Sanctuary.‚Äù It‚Äôs a chance to come together as a community and support those most vulnerable right now. We'll be collecting donations for CHIRLA (Coalition for Humane Immigrant Rights), an LA-based organization providing low-cost legal services and advocacy for immigrants and refugees. We hope that you can join us July 13th. Thank you in advance for your generosity. ü§ç

Name: Vigil for Shared Safety: Rooting in Tradition
Organization: If Not Now Los Angeles, Standing Together For Peace, Never Again Action, Chavurah, Summer of Resistance
State Purpose: Join IfNotNow at Placita Olvera on Sunday, July 13 @ 4 PM in partnership with the @summerofresistance coalition, for an afternoon of prayer, art, and learning at the Shared Safety Vigil: Rooting in Tradition.
